amendment.description: Amendment adds a new section prohibiting funds in the bill from being used for payment to any person for the filling of any position for which he or she has been nominated after the Senate has voted not to approve the nomination of said person.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section prohibiting funds in the bill from being used for payment to any person for the filling of any position for which he or she has been nominated after the Senate has voted not to approve the nomination of said person.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
